properties.name: restlight.server.ext.whitelist.enable
properties.description: Is enable the whitelist.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.whitelist.ips
properties.description: Direct ips or regex starts with 'regex:'.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.whitelist.cache-size
properties.description: Max size of the ip cache.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.whitelist.expire
properties.description: Expire mills time of the ip cache.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.connection-creation-limit.max-per-second
properties.description: Max http connection creation per second.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.connection-creation-limit.enable
properties.description: Is max http connection creation limit enable.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.cpu-load-protection.enable
properties.description: Is protection of cpu load enable.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.cpu-load-protection.threshold
properties.description: Threshold of the cpu load(discard connection if over than this value).

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.cpu-load-protection.initial-discard-rate
properties.description: Initial probability used to discard the connection.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.cpu-load-protection.max-discard-rate
properties.description: Max probability used to discard the connection.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.access-log.enable
properties.description: Is enable the access log.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.access-log.full-uri
properties.description: Is enable to print full uri of the request.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.enable
properties.description: Is enable the access log.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.directory
properties.description: Log file directory

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.file-name
properties.description: Log file name

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.charset
properties.description: charset of log messages

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.rolling
properties.description: is rolling file enable

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.date-pattern
properties.description: date pattern of history files

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.max-history
properties.description: max num of history files

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.accesslog.full-uri
properties.description: Is enable to print full uri of the request

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.xss.enable
properties.description: Is enable intercept xss and it's based on filter parameter & header of request.

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.xss.mode
properties.description: Escape or filter

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.cors.enable
properties.description: Is cross origin source sharing enable

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.cors.rules
properties.description: Rules of cors
